questions: Can you provide an example of a project where you designed the database architecture for a client project at Fluentgrid Limited?
How have you utilized your expertise in SQL and PLSQL to create and modify tables, views, stored procedures, functions, and indexes in your current role as a Database Engineer?
Can you explain a specific instance where you used triggers, temporary tables, and CTE recursive methods in your database development work?
How have you leveraged your skills in Business Intelligence tools like Pentaho Kettle to write transformations (ETL) in your projects?
What experience do you have in configuring, tuning, and maintaining MS-SQL Server and PL/SQL-Oracle database servers at Fluentgrid Limited?
Can you describe a challenging situation you encountered while creating ETL jobs and monitoring their performance? How did you overcome it?
How has your academic background in Computer Science Engineering contributed to your proficiency in database tools such as Sybase ASE, Oracle, and Pentaho data integration?
What motivated you to participate in workshops on topics like mobile application development, security and software engineering, and cloud computing technology?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends in database technologies and programming languages like Core Java, HTML, and CSS?
In what ways do you believe your experience and skills make you a valuable asset to a potential employer in the IT industry?
